name: User without organization logs in with auth token via CLI
description:
- Login with valid credentials **via UI**.
- Get Bearer auth token from Playwright local storage.

### Verify that:

- User can login with Bearer auth token **via CLI**.
- Login output in CLI doesn't contain `organization` and `project`.
descriptionHtml:
• Login with valid credentials via UI.
  • Get Bearer auth token from Playwright local storage.

Verify that:

  • User can login with Bearer auth token via CLI.
  • Login output in CLI doesn't contain organization and project.
statusMessage:
AssertionError: [AssertionError] during step: Login via UI
Message: [AssertionError] during step: Verify that Welcome new user page displayed
Message: Locator expected to be visible
Actual value: <element(s) not found> 
Call log:
  - Expect "to_be_visible" with timeout 5000ms
  - waiting for locator("h3.truncate.text-h3").filter(has_text="Welcome, regression-b3ava4qwop@apolo.us")

tests/reporting_hooks/reporting.py:58: in wrapper

steps.name: Verify Apolo CLI client is installed

testStage.description:
- Login with valid credentials **via UI**.
- Get Bearer auth token from Playwright local storage.

### Verify that:

- User can login with Bearer auth token **via CLI**.
- Login output in CLI doesn't contain `organization` and `project`.
testStage.descriptionHtml:
• Login with valid credentials via UI.
  • Get Bearer auth token from Playwright local storage.

Verify that:

  • User can login with Bearer auth token via CLI.
  • Login output in CLI doesn't contain organization and project.
